extension.description: Navrženo pro zjednodušení práce s ovladačem, myší či dotykovou obrazovkou.[CR][CR]Podporuje funkce -[CR][CR] Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / Nahrávání-PRV / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Designet til nem brug med fjernbetjening, mus eller touchskærrm.[CR][CR]Understøtter -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Designt für einfachen Einsatz mit Fernbedienung, Maus oder Touchscreen.[CR][CR]Unterstützt - [CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Globale Suche / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Σχεδιασμένο για χρήση με τηλεχειριστήριο, ποντίκι ή οθόνη αφής.[CR][CR]Υποστηρίζονται -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Επιπλέον Εικόνες / Γενικευμένη Αναζήτηση / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus
Designed for ease of use with remote, mouse or touchscreen.[CR][CR]Supports -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Deseñado para un uso sinxelo co mando, rato ou pantalla táctil.[CR][CR]Soporta -[CR][CR]Experiencia formato Cine / Ilustracións Adicionais / Busca Xeral / PVR / Seguintes Emisións de TV / Sintonización de TV / Listas / Meteoroloxía Adicional
Távirányítóval, egérrel és érintőképnyővel is használható.[CR][CR]Támogatás -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus
리모컨, 마우스 또는 터치스크린으로 사용하기 쉽게 디자인되었습니다.[CR][CR]지원하는 기능 -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Ontworpen voor makkelijke bediening middels afstandbediening, muis of touchscreen.[CR][CR]Ondersteunt -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Designet for enkel bruk med fjernkontroll, mus eller berøringsskjerm.[CR][CR]Støtter-[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Zaprojektowane dla łatwej obsługi pilotem, myszką lub ekranem dotykowym.[CR][CR]Obsługuje: Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Concebida para ser fácil de usar com controle remoto, rato ou ecrã táctil.[CR][CR]Compatível com -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Desenhada para ser fácil de usar com controle remote, mouse ou touchscreen.[CR][CR]Suporta -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus

Designat för enkelt användande med fjärrkontroll, mus eller pekskärm.[CR][CR]Stöder -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork /Global sökning / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist /Weather Plus

Uzaktan, fareyle ya da dokunmatik ekranlarda kolay kullanım sağlamak için tasarlanmıştır.[CR][CR]Destekledikleri-[CR][CR]Sinema Deneyimi / Fazladan Çizim / Genel Arama / PVR / Sıradaki Canlı Yayın / TV Müzikleri / İzleme Listesi / Hava Durumu Plus
为方便遥控器、鼠标或触摸屏使用而设计。[CR][CR]支持 -[CR][CR]Cinema Experience / Extra Artwork / Global Search / PVR / TV Next Aired / TV Tunes / Watchlist / Weather Plus
extension.disclaimer: Codificado na súa orixe por Wir3d/Jezz_X
